description:
A special gift for the Bladelord! Includes a set of basic healing items that are great for early-game healing.

Set includes:
Petit Potion (HP Recovery) x20
Lime Potion (HP Recovery) x10
Light Meds (SP Recovery) x20
Curapple (Poison Recovery) x10
Coolberry (Burn Recovery) x10
Remembanana (Amnesia Recovery) x10
Melticot (Freeze Recovery) x10
name: Beginner's Healing Kit
